name: My NPC Life
description:
I made this in one-sitting on my stream. The only thing I had planned for making this game was the game concept of being a non-hero in a hero filled world. It took about 4 hours to make. This was the first game I made in RPG Maker so it was an experience.

Thanks for playing my game and to everyone who watched me make this game.
